DOC.brief_summary: The study aim deliver robust pre-post evaluation wellbeing impact innovative , brief , scalable psychosocial intervention , deliver refugee youth live urban settlement Jordan . The study conduct use two wave data collection : first feature intervention match control group , second feature full randomize control trial .
